duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic and moderate complexity Flow Cytometry and Cell Based Assay in compliance with cGMP, CFR, and SOPs.
Complete assigned Test Methods, assay development, and general laboratory duties.
Conduct assays at R&D level in collaboration with Technical Reviewer, as assigned by Management.
Perform STAT assays with schedule flexibility and rapid completion for in-process testing.
Accurately complete Test Methods and required documentation according to cGMP, CFR, and SOPs.
Work with BSL-2 materials and follow all general and laboratory SOPs.
Effectively interact with vendors and clients as needed, and as assigned by Management.
Initiate Laboratory Investigations, Deviations, and Non-Conforming events as directed.
Perform analysis of results and report data to Technical Reviewer or supervisor.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Masters’ degree in Biological Sciences or other science-related major (PhD preferred)
